content.description: A couple balancy moves attain the first bolt, then thoughtful movement past the second bolt. Great horizontals through the face lead to some more burly moves at the roof, trending up and right to the chains.
content.location: The face just right of the cave. Shares anchors with "Lunchbox R.I.P.").

content.description: A couple low bolts help protect the potential to hit ledges/blocks/boulders on what may be tricky moves (particularly if dry tooling). Some gymnastics at the 3rd bolt help to attain the face above the roof with great clipping holds for the 4th bolt. Continue up the face on rails/horizontals to the final overhang, then fire a few more moves to the anchors.
content.location: MIA exits the right side of the cave at its apex.

content.description: Start up the slab then begin stemming to the right once above the roof. Move up the clean face on good horizontals (pumpy) and negotiate a couple harder moves at the 4th bolt. Steeper than it appears.
content.location: The leftmost route on the wall.

content.description: Scamper up easy terrain in the corner to the first bolt and continue up the corner until the steeper headwall below the overhang. A bit of balance establishes you below the overhang, then pass the 5th and 6th bolts on their right. Clip the anchor from a nice rail right of the chains, or scoot left to the clipping jug on "Take Care of Her."
content.location: Starts just uphill around the corner from  and shares anchors with "Take Care of Her".
